item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, February 19, 2025 at 2:45 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Valve releases Team Fortress 2 game code (952 points | 226 comments)
2. A year of uv: pros, cons, and should you migrate (206 points | 86 comments)
3. Alice Hamilton waged a one-woman campaign to get the lead out of everything (48 points | 9 comments)
4. Why the Number Line Freaks Me Out (2016) (17 points | 2 comments)

7. XOR (248 points | 32 comments)

9. Launch HN: Promptless (YC W25) – Automatic updates for customer-facing docs (55 points | 31 comments)
10. File Pilot: A file explorer built for speed with a modern, robust interface (102 points | 37 comments)
11. Migraine is more than a headache – a rethink offers hope (79 points | 99 comments)

13. Little Sisyphus A physics-based platformer for the NES (16 points | 1 comment)

16. South Korean regulator accuses DeepSeek of sharing user data with ByteDance (171 points | 84 comments)
17. Converge (YC S23) is hiring engineer #2 in NYC ( | hide)
18. Tensor evolution: A framework for fast tensor computations using recurrences (38 points | 5 comments)
19. HP Acquires Humane's AI Software (95 points | 87 comments)
20. Why I'm writing a Scheme implementation in 2025: Async Rust (181 points | 70 comments)
21. Show HN: A GPU-accelerated binary vector index (40 points | 4 comments)
22. Are LLMs able to play the card game Set? (33 points | 20 comments)
23. Try thinking and learning without working memory (2008) (112 points | 57 comments)
24. Saying goodbye to FFmpegKit (147 points | 80 comments)
25. Making my debug build run 100x faster so that it is finally usable (55 points | 13 comments)
26. Nuclear fusion: WEST beats the world record for plasma duration (237 points | 221 comments)
27. Kleene as a Container Management Platform for FreeBSD (47 points | 8 comments)
28. Programming with chronic pain (110 points | 53 comments)
29. Meta announces LlamaCon, its first generative AI dev conference on April 29 (99 points | 45 comments)
30. Among top researchers 10% publish at unrealistic levels, analysis finds (154 points | 96 comments)
